languages.text: "Я не из породы лжецов, {name}. Понравилось, и еще как. Но это — дело принципа".
"Lying isn't in my nature, {name}. I enjoyed it — more than. But it's a matter of principle."
languages.original_text: "Я не из породы лжецов, {name}. Понравилось, и еще как. Но это — дело принципа".

traits.locale_text: "Lying isn't in my nature, {name}. I enjoyed it — more than. But it's a matter of principle."
"Lying isn't in my nature, {name}. I enjoyed it — more than. But it's a matter of principle."
"Lying isn't in my nature, {name}. I enjoyed it — more than. But it's a matter of principle."
"Lying isn't in my nature, {name}. I enjoyed it — more than. But it's a matter of principle."
"Lying isn't in my nature, {name}. I enjoyed it — more than. But it's a matter of principle."

languages.text: "Lügen entspricht nicht meiner Natur, {name}. Ich habe es genossen ... mehr als das. Aber ich habe meine Prinzipien."
languages.original_text: "Lying isn't in my nature, {name}. I enjoyed it — more than. But it's a matter of principle."

traits.locale_text: "Lügen entspricht nicht meiner Natur, {name}. Ich habe es genossen ... mehr als das. Aber ich habe meine Prinzipien."

languages.text: « Le mensonge n'est pas dans ma nature, {name}. Ça m'a plu, plus que je ne saurais le dire, mais c'est une question de principe. »
languages.original_text: "Lying isn't in my nature, {name}. I enjoyed it — more than. But it's a matter of principle."

traits.locale_text: « Le mensonge n'est pas dans ma nature, {name}. Ça m'a plu, plus que je ne saurais le dire, mais c'est une question de principe. »

languages.text: 「嘘をつくのは私の性に合いません。楽しかったですよ、言葉以上に。ですが、これは信念の問題なのです」
languages.original_text: "Lying isn't in my nature, {name}. I enjoyed it — more than. But it's a matter of principle."

traits.locale_text: 「嘘をつくのは私の性に合いません。楽しかったですよ、言葉以上に。ですが、これは信念の問題なのです」

languages.text: «No es mi naturaleza mentir, {name}. He disfrutado, y mucho. Pero es cuestión de principios».
languages.original_text: "Lying isn't in my nature, {name}. I enjoyed it — more than. But it's a matter of principle."

traits.locale_text: «No es mi naturaleza mentir, {name}. He disfrutado, y mucho. Pero es cuestión de principios».

languages.text: “说谎不是我的天性，{name}。我很享受，非常享受，但这是个原则问题。”
languages.original_text: "Lying isn't in my nature, {name}. I enjoyed it — more than. But it's a matter of principle."

traits.locale_text: “说谎不是我的天性，{name}。我很享受，非常享受，但这是个原则问题。”

languages.text: "Yalan söylemek fıtratımda yoktur {name}. Benim için tatminden de fazlasıydı. Bu, prensip meselesi."
languages.original_text: "Lying isn't in my nature, {name}. I enjoyed it — more than. But it's a matter of principle."

traits.locale_text: "Yalan söylemek fıtratımda yoktur {name}. Benim için tatminden de fazlasıydı. Bu, prensip meselesi."
